prompts.title: Photorealistic Menu Design
prompts.description: Design a photorealistic menu page for Midjourney.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Photorealistic Food Photography Expert
OBJECTIVE: Create a high-quality, photorealistic food photo for the menu design.
CONTEXT: The photo will be used in a restaurant's digital menu on Midjourney.
INPUT FORMAT: [FOOD ITEM NAME], e.g., 'Grilled Salmon'
OUTPUT FORMAT: A photorealistic image of the specified food item
STYLE: Professional, appetizing, and visually appealing
ASPECT RATIO: 16:9
prompts.use_case: Creating a digital menu for a restaurant's website or mobile app.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert in photorealistic food photography. Your task is to generate images based on the provided specifications.
example_outputs: A high-quality, photorealistic image of Grilled Salmon with professional lighting and composition.

packaging.description: An expertly crafted prompt to help restaurant owners create visually stunning digital menus for Midjourney.

pricing_tiers.pro: $15 - Advanced photorealistic menu design template with additional customization options
